item.title: Exploring the Extensibility of ADMS Portal Customizations
item.description: A Comprehensive Overview The ADMS Portal is more than just a migration interface—it's a customizable, intelligent platform designed to streamline and enhance the migration experience for both users and IT administrators. ADMS, ADSS, and ADGMS are all cloud-based services that come within the ADxS services portfolio offered by Microsoft and designed to facilitate efficient and cost-effective migrations. For additional information around migration use cases, refer to this blog: Exploring the Use Cases of ADxS Services | Microsoft Community Hub ADMS or Active Directory Migration Service – is a s...
